languages.text: "Утверждение ложно, данный материал является качественным базовым компонентом для сервиторизации",{n} — как бы между прочим вворачивает Паскаль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Утверждение ложно, данный материал является качественным базовым компонентом для сервиторизации",{n} — как бы между прочим вворачивает Паскаль.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "This statement is false. The unit is still fit to serve as high-quality base material for the purpose of servitorisation," {n}Pasqal interjects for seemingly no particular reason.{/n}

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Die Einheit kann noch als hochwertige Basiskomponente zur Servitorisierung dienen," {n}wirft Pasqal anscheinend ohne besonderen Grund ein.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The unit is still fit to serve as high-quality base material for the purpose of servitorisation," {n}Pasqal interjects for seemingly no particular reason.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Die Einheit kann noch als hochwertige Basiskomponente zur Servitorisierung dienen," {n}wirft Pasqal anscheinend ohne besonderen Grund ein.{/n}

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. L'unité comporte encore des matériaux basiques de qualité permettant une servitorisation, » {n}indique Pasqal sans raison apparente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The unit is still fit to serve as high-quality base material for the purpose of servitorisation," {n}Pasqal interjects for seemingly no particular reason.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. L'unité comporte encore des matériaux basiques de qualité permettant une servitorisation, » {n}indique Pasqal sans raison apparente.{/n}

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。此单位依然拥有强大的功用性，可以改造成非常高效的机仆。”{n}帕斯卡似乎毫无来由地突然插了一句话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The unit is still fit to serve as high-quality base material for the purpose of servitorisation," {n}Pasqal interjects for seemingly no particular reason.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。此单位依然拥有强大的功用性，可以改造成非常高效的机仆。”{n}帕斯卡似乎毫无来由地突然插了一句话。{/n}

languages.text: «Esa afirmación es falsa. La unidad aún es válida para su uso como material de gran calidad dedicado a la servidorización». {n}Pasqal interviene sin un motivo particular aparente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The unit is still fit to serve as high-quality base material for the purpose of servitorisation," {n}Pasqal interjects for seemingly no particular reason.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esa afirmación es falsa. La unidad aún es válida para su uso como material de gran calidad dedicado a la servidorización». {n}Pasqal interviene sin un motivo particular aparente.{/n}

languages.text: 「この陳述は偽だ。このユニットは依然として高品質なサーヴィター化の基礎素材として使用可能であり…」{n}パスカルが特に理由もなく口を挟んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The unit is still fit to serve as high-quality base material for the purpose of servitorisation," {n}Pasqal interjects for seemingly no particular reason.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この陳述は偽だ。このユニットは依然として高品質なサーヴィター化の基礎素材として使用可能であり…」{n}パスカルが特に理由もなく口を挟んだ。{/n}

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Birim, hizmetörleştirme amacıyla hâlâ yüksek kaliteli temel materyal olarak hizmet vermeye uygundur." {n}Pasqal, görünürde özel bir neden olmaksızın araya giriyor.{/n}
